blogPost.excerpt: SnapSmile is an app that uses your eating habits + images of your teeth to provide you with the insights, and recommendations you need to improve your oral health at home. Think of SnapSmile like your own Dental Coach.
blogPost.body: SnapSmile is an app that uses your eating habits + images of your teeth to provide you with the insights, and recommendations you need to improve your oral health at home. Think of SnapSmile like your own Dental Coach.
blogPost.title: SnapSmile - We use machine learning to help improve your dental health
blogPost.author: Kartik Bala

localize.description: SnapSmilar是一款应用程序，它使用你的饮食习惯+你的牙齿图像，为你提供改善家里口腔健康所需的洞察力和建议。把SnapSmilar想象成你自己的牙科教练。
localize.tagline: 我们使用机器学习来帮助改善您的牙齿健康

localize.description: SnapSmilar是一款應用程序，它使用你的飲食習慣+你的牙齒圖像，爲你提供改善家裏口腔健康所需的洞察力和建議。把SnapSmilar想象成你自己的牙科教練。
localize.tagline: 我們使用機器學習來幫助改善您的牙齒健康

previous.excerpt: AwardsAdda is a centralized award repository, that caters to the needs to store and share your Awards & Achievements.
previous.title: AwardsAdda -  AwardsAdda is a centralized award repository

localize.description: AwardsAdda是一个集中式的奖项库，它满足了存储和分享你的奖项和成就的需求。
AwardsAdda是一個集中式的獎項庫，它滿足了存儲和分享你的獎項和成就的需求。

next.excerpt: Heart Reports V2 can generate separate blood sugar, blood pressure, blood oxygen, heart rate, activity and sleep reports. All perfectly designed for printing, so you can easily show your Apple Health data to your doctor. Now with Widgets and Shortcuts support.
next.title: Heart Reports v2 - Export beautiful PDF health reports from the iOS Health app

localize.description: Heart Reports V2可以单独生成血糖、血压、血氧、心率、活动和睡眠报告。所有报告都经过完美设计，可供打印，因此你可以轻松地向医生展示你的 Apple 健康数据。现在支持Widgets和快捷键。
localize.tagline: 从iOS健康应用中导出精美的PDF健康报告。

localize.description: Heart Reports V2可以單獨生成血糖、血壓、血氧、心率、活動和睡眠報告。所有報告都經過完美設計，可供打印，因此你可以輕鬆地向醫生展示你的 Apple 健康數據。現在支持Widgets和快捷鍵。
localize.tagline: 從iOS健康應用中導出精美的PDF健康報告。
